languages.text: "Ты никому не причинил зла, и потому я не причиню зла тебе. Ты свободен. Можешь остаться на корабле, если хочешь".
"Your actions have caused no harm, and so I shall not harm you. You are free. You may stay on my ship if you so choose."
languages.original_text: "Ты никому не причинил зла, и потому я не причиню зла тебе. Ты свободен. Можешь остаться на корабле, если хочешь".

traits.locale_text: "Your actions have caused no harm, and neither shall I harm you. You are free. You may stay on my ship if you so choose."
"Your actions have caused no harm, and neither shall I harm you. You are free. You may stay on my ship if you so choose."
"Your actions have caused no harm, and so I shall not harm you. You are free. You may stay on my ship if you so choose."
"Your actions have caused no harm, and so I shall not harm you. You are free. You may stay on my ship if you so choose."
"Your actions have caused no harm, and so I shall not harm you. You are free. You may stay on my ship if you so choose."

languages.text: 「あなたの行いは何の被害も出していない。だから私もあなたを傷つけない。あなたは自由の身だ。望むなら私の船に留まってもいい」
languages.original_text: "Your actions have caused no harm, and so I shall not harm you. You are free. You may stay on my ship if you so choose."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの行いは何の被害も出していない。だから私もあなたを傷つけない。あなたは自由の身だ。望むなら私の船に留まってもいい」

languages.text: “你的行为没有造成任何伤害，所以我也不打算伤害你。你自由了。如果你愿意，你可以留在我的船上。”
languages.original_text: "Your actions have caused no harm, and so I shall not harm you. You are free. You may stay on my ship if you so choose."

traits.locale_text: “你的行为没有造成任何伤害，所以我也不打算伤害你。你自由了。如果你愿意，你可以留在我的船上。”

languages.text: "Euer Verhalten hat keinen Schaden verursacht, also werde auch ich Euch nicht schaden. Ihr seid frei. Ihr dürft auf meinem Schiff bleiben, wenn Ihr das möchtet."
languages.original_text: "Your actions have caused no harm, and so I shall not harm you. You are free. You may stay on my ship if you so choose."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Verhalten hat keinen Schaden verursacht, also werde auch ich Euch nicht schaden. Ihr seid frei. Ihr dürft auf meinem Schiff bleiben, wenn Ihr das möchtet."

languages.text: « Puisque vos actes n'ont causé aucun préjudice, je ne vous ferai aucun mal. Vous êtes libre. Vous pouvez rester sur mon vaisseau si vous le souhaitez. »
languages.original_text: "Your actions have caused no harm, and so I shall not harm you. You are free. You may stay on my ship if you so choose."

traits.locale_text: « Puisque vos actes n'ont causé aucun préjudice, je ne vous ferai aucun mal. Vous êtes libre. Vous pouvez rester sur mon vaisseau si vous le souhaitez. »

languages.text: «Sus actos no han causado mal alguno, y por tanto yo tampoco se lo causaré. Queda usted libre. Y puede permanecer en mi nave, si tal es su deseo».
languages.original_text: "Your actions have caused no harm, and so I shall not harm you. You are free. You may stay on my ship if you so choose."

traits.locale_text: «Sus actos no han causado mal alguno, y por tanto yo tampoco se lo causaré. Queda usted libre. Y puede permanecer en mi nave, si tal es su deseo».

languages.text: "Davranışların kimseyi incitmedi, ben de seni incitmeyeceğim. Özgürsün. İstersen gemimde kalabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "Your actions have caused no harm, and so I shall not harm you. You are free. You may stay on my ship if you so choose."

traits.locale_text: "Davranışların kimseyi incitmedi, ben de seni incitmeyeceğim. Özgürsün. İstersen gemimde kalabilirsin."
